entry.tran: 无法挽救的;无法弥补的
entry.def: If you talk about irretrievable damage or an irretrievable situation, you mean that the damage or situation is so bad that there is no possibility of putting it right.

example.ex: What a tragedy if the sport suffers irretrievable damage because this issue is ducked.
example.tran: 如果该运动因这一问题被回避而承受无法弥补的损失,那将是何种悲剧。
无可挽回地走向衰落的国家

means.word_mean: 1. impossible to recover or recoup or overcome;
